content: Our studio Les Animals is currently working on an interactive comic book project to celebrate the year 2023. In collaboration with a sound designer and an illustrator, we are working on developing a unique, interactive and playful experience.

For 6 days, I was assigned by Gordon, who would like to start his own micro-business as a wedding videographer and develop his brand and reputation. For him, I realized alone :

  • a UX approach
  • a brand book
  • a logo
  • communication approaches on social networks
  • a website with Vue.js

This is how Gordon Wedding Films was born. Take a look at my Pitch presentation.

Les Campanules is a residence with supervision for seniors in Switzerland. On this project with my studio Les Animals, I participated in the development. Like many of the studio's projects, it is based on a custom WordPress theme, complete with Twig, SASS, and JavaScript.

The Swissroc real estate group commissioned a landing page generator to my studio, Les Animals. The purpose of this generator is to promote the new residences of the group. We deliver a generator, based on WordPress, and the client can then deploy as many sites as he wants by himself. The contents will be the same each time, only the graphic identity will differ.
Catch them all ! To enjoy myself, I made a little pokedex. Thanks to the Pok√©API and Vue.js, dust off some memories...

Saintio will be to bio what Spotify was to music. Saintio will be a new type of organic supermarket, imagined during a school project. It will not have a physical store, only online sales. The orders will be delivered or available in click and collect. I realized alone the creation of this brand, its concept, its positioning and its identity. Saintio will propose a subscription system that will make organic food accessible to everyone, everywhere. Saintio will be a company with strong commitments :

  • certified and seasonal organic products
  • a source of less than 250km
  • transportation of products by train as much as possible; no airplanes
  • low prices

Join the REBIOLUTION ! üçÉ
My first project at Les Animals. Certif Pro is a joint association serving the professional retraining of private sector employees. I benefited from a great autonomy to develop this WordPress.
At FCINQ, I was able to discover Nuxt.js thanks to a blindtest for Sourdoreille, called "Qui est Kick ?". On this mission, I was in charge of the front-end development from a Figma mockup.

The Series Mania festival went digital and I was able to take part in the front-end development within FCINQ. A WordPress adapted to the constraints of the festival to have to broadcast live or replay, as well as to offer reservations for sessions.

A unique experience for an important subject. The French National Cancer Institute asked FCINQ to promote the vaccination against the human papillomavirus. I took part in the front-end technical realization through a site powered by GSAP.

For the CHOPARD Automobile group, I was entrusted with highlighting the possibility of making a covering on a Mercedes Benz Actros truck. In 5 days, I designed and coded an interactive experience for the user, with a bit of 3D. ü™Ñ

I created a web application for my school, ESADD, to digitize the management of student attendance during classes, with a front-office for students and lecturers as well as a back-office for the management. All of this was done in the most streamlined and efficient user experience possible.

During 5 days, we had to produce, with two others ESADD students, a promotional video of the new electric engine of DS3 Crossback. Through DS Automobiles, it was necessary thanks to After Effects to highlight the transition to electric.
